title: This Guy has a INT list, and trolled in my game.
body:

a replay, ignore sounds xD, but thats the chat claiming he trolls with certain people. although the game was remade cause cho went to afk at the start, he half connected then closed his game cause of this, and he shouldn't be penalized for this.

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

If you want Riot to see a player like this and do something about it, the best way is to report the person through end of game lobby. [It is the **best** way to ensure a player will get picked up by the punishment system. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

Please do not name and shame players on the boards, despite your best intentions it is not a good way to go. Posts that break this [rule](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) will be edited/removed.
